transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji, hi, good evening.
Executive: Good evening.
Customer: Hi, sir. Actually, main Ravin baat kar raha tha IndiaMART ke open Noida se Power Pack Rubber ke liye call kiya tha aapko.
Executive: Bataiye.
Customer: Actually, sir, promotion IndiaMART mein aapko dekh raha tha. Aapke end se na ek video meeting ki request aayi thi hamare paas.
Executive: Ek second hold dijiye. Ek second hold. Haanji, haanji.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Main ek baar confirm karke I'll give you a call. Main kahin meeting mein baitha hoon. Mujhe aap 15-20 minute ka time dijiye, I'll give you a call, right?
Customer: Sure, sir. Aap please unko boliyega maine call bhi kiya primary number pe, woh receive nahi kar rahe.
Executive: I know, I know, I know. Main bolta hoon. Main bolta hoon. Please unko boliye connect karenge.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a video meeting request.

- Customer's call on primary number not being received.



Resolution:

- Executive will confirm and call back in 15-20 minutes.

- Executive will ask them to connect with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 15-20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, call back, primary number
